attributes.action: eu membership  needing cost  analysis and  benefit
attributes.additional_details:
It is  my  view that EU membership costs  equates to the  UK  national  dept . Also damaging living  standards  and the national identity of  its  citizens . There has  been a  oversight in not investigating  by  analysis  the benefits or none  benefits  to  our remaining membership.    This  is  now  a must  requirement !  Cost benefits  analysis  should  be  called for  by -  1/ Academic proffessorship and  - 2/ A accountants company  to  enable  fair objectivity .
 The   last  five (5)  years  history  at  least  should be  revued .
